price: 31 Puis le Jour de la résurrection, c’est devant votre Seigneur que vous porterez vos différends.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyāmati ʿinda rabbikum takhtaṣimūna
